email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Oceanic Star, 150,000 DWT, with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15th-20th October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s (USD/ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Could you consider mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $48.50/ton, but that’s the best I can do given current market conditions. The demurrage rate is $20,000/day. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. We can agree to $48.50/ton, but could you confirm the laytime details? Also, is the vessel fully compliant with all necessary certifications? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the rate works for you. The laytime is 72 hours total, with 24 hours for loading and 48 hours for discharge. The MV Oceanic Star is fully compliant with all certifications, including ISM and ISPS. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’re good to proceed. Please send over the charter party agreement, and we’ll review and sign it promptly. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, John
